comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This appears to be the barrel segment (it was transported in three parts) of the Skoda 305 mm Model 1911 en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skoda_305_mm_Model_1911. 8 were loaned to the German army in August, 1914 by the Austro-Hungarian Army for use in destroying Belgian fortifications at Liege and elsewhere. One account states that Austro-Hungarian soldiers operated these in Belgium. An extremely detailed, illustrated article on this weapon: www.landships.freeservers.com/305mm_morser_m11.htm
